acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle constructors with multiple generics during Pojo instantiation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleConstructorsWithMultipleGenericsDuringPojoInstantiation

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class java.lang.String and class java.lang.String should be equal
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.Character
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.Byte and value of type class java.lang.Integer
